name: Environment Survey Overview
title: Environment Survey Overview
body:
The Environment Survey is an optional survey located on your KnowBe4 console Dashboard tab that will provide KnowBe4 with additional data about the security systems used in your environment. This data helps us plan future integrations with the products that you use the most. We also use this information to update you about any changes that could impact your organization’s security training.

Completing the Survey

You can find the Environment Survey at the bottom of the Dashboard tab after logging in to your KnowBe4 console. Click Get Started to begin the survey. You can exit the survey at any time without losing your progress by clicking the Save and Exit button.

The survey consists of 10 questions and only takes a few minutes to complete. You can select multiple responses for each question if you use more than one service or software in your organization. The current question must be answered in order to advance to the next one.

Survey Responses

Once you have completed the survey, you can view your responses in your account settings under Account Information > Environment Information. You can edit your survey responses by clicking the Edit Environment Information button. You can also clear all results and retake the survey from the beginning by clicking Clear All Responses.

This section contains a single, bordered UI card detailing an optional process:

**Card Title Area:**

images.alt:
The screen displays the **Environment Information** configuration interface, structured as a data collection form with a primary heading.

The interface presents ten distinct questions (labels), each immediately followed by a single-line input field. All input fields are pre-populated with obscured (blurred) text, indicating existing, protected configuration data.

**Question Labels (Contextual Categories):**

1.  Email security
2.  Endpoint security/antivirus software
3.  Learning management system (LMS)
4.  User information organization/storage systems
5.  Identity provider (for single sign-on)
6.  Web security
7.  Network security systems/applications
8.  SIEM or SOAR platform (for threat management)
9.  Chat applications
10. Other security systems/products (general query)

**Action Buttons:**
The bottom of the interface features two horizontal action buttons:

1.  **Edit Environment Information:** Styled as a secondary button (light background, border).
2.  **Clear All Responses:** Styled as a prominent, destructive primary button (red background, white text).
